===Etymology===
From Chinese [[莫]] ([[w:Mo Ye|Mo Ye]]) + [[干]] ([[w:Gan Jiang|Gan Jiang]]), two legendary southern swordsmiths during China's [[Spring and Autumn]] Period, + [[山]] ("[[mountain]]; [[mountain]] [[range]]").
